# init(_:)

**Initializer**

Creates a preview intent.

## Declaration

```swift
init(_ rawValue: String)
```

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**: Creates a preview intent with the specified raw value.

items.description: Creates a preview intent with the specified raw value.
items.name: init(rawValue:)
